title: maxverify
description: Verify an RSA signature against a public key.

response.description: Present when verification succeeds (status:true). When status:false, check error field.

error.description: Error message when status is false (e.g., invalid signature length)

x-parameters.data: Original data that was signed (0x-prefixed hex). REQUIRED.

x-agent-warnings: When verification fails, status is false and error contains the reason
The publickey must be the full RSA DER-encoded key, not just a hash
